name: My first platformer (Weirdly)
description:
This is the first game I ever created so It probably isn't that good. Consider this as my practice for games i develop in the future.

This is just a simple 2D platformer game with no story, so don't expect any secrets. There is a boss level at the end of the game but it isn't anything special. As I said, this is just practice for getting to know unity for future game development.
